BUSINESS CONTEXT.Current challenges/pain points: Need for improved interface, sales pipeline, and sequencing functionality
BUSINESS CONTEXT.Growth stage indicators: Expanding product offerings, considering spin-off of PCRM

RELATIONSHIP MAPPING.Trust level indicators: Existing customer, considering upgrade to PCRM

resolution_tracking.resolution_steps_taken: demo and discussion of PCRM features

CUSTOMER_JOURNEY_STAGE.Feature_utilization: Moderate to high, with new features being adopted
CUSTOMER_JOURNEY_STAGE.Expansion_opportunities: High, considering new deals pipeline and simple sequencing features

RETENTION_FACTORS.Satisfaction_drivers: User-friendly interface, new features, integration capabilities
RETENTION_FACTORS.Risk_indicators: Cost concerns, all users must upgrade even if not all use the new system
RETENTION_FACTORS.Loyalty_signals: Interest in new features, positive feedback on interface
RETENTION_FACTORS.Advocacy_potential: High, based on satisfaction with new functionalities and improvements

COMMUNICATION_PREFERENCES.Decision-making_patterns: Collaborative, involves discussions with team members
